info.name: Automated Resolve Setting API
info.description:
# Introduction

Resolve Pay API's Are Designed To Capture The Organization And Employee Information To Compute Payrun And Manage Journey Of Organization And Employee.

# Authentication

Every request must contain Authorization : Bearer Token identifying the API account as specified in the Authentication section.

# Error Codes

| **Response Code** | **Error** |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Request Was Completed Successfully |
| 400 | Bad Request |
| 401 | Un Authorized |
| 404 | API Not Found Exception |
| 405 | Method Not Allowed, Check API End Point |
| 500 | Internal Server Failure or server timed out |

request.description:
Resolve Pay Login Having Three Modes

- Resolve Admin
- Employee : Direct Login
- Partner
    

**1\. Resolve Admin : mode_id -> 1**

[https://qa-api.resolveindia.com/organization/login-mode/{mode_id}](https://qa-api.resolveindia.com/organization/login-mode/{mode_id})

ex : [https://qa-api.resolveindia.com/organization/login-mode/](https://qa-api.resolveindia.com/organization/login-mode/{mode_id})1

**2\. Partner : mode_id -> 3 & partner_org_id {}**

[https://qa-api.resolveindia.com/organization/login-mode/{mode_id}/{partner_org_id}](https://qa-api.resolveindia.com/organization/login-mode/{mode_id}/{partner_org_id})

[ex :](https://qa-api.resolveindia.com/organization/login-mode/{mode_id}/{partner_org_id}) [https://qa-api.resolveindia.com/organization/login-mode/](https://qa-api.resolveindia.com/organization/login-mode/{mode_id})1/17
